headline: Is Synopsys (SNPS) Still Attractive After Recent Share Price Pullback?
summary: If you are wondering whether Synopsys at around US$426 is still a quality buy or starting to look expensive, you are asking the right question and valuation is the place to start. The share price is around US$426 after a 3.7% decline over the last 7 days, a 15.3% decline over 30 days and an 11.3% decline year to date, against a 6.3% decline over the last year and returns of 17.2% over 3 years and 85.4% over 5 years. Recent headlines around Synopsys have focused on its role as a key software...
